title: (x) Uppercase sans - various licence plate font suggestions {Akira}
content:
Hi - and Merry Christmas to everyone.

Can anyone identify this font for me?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080659im_/http:/typophile.com/files/identify_5511.gif)

Thanks

Pete
author: skypete

comments.content:
Merry Christmas!

Try [UK Number Plate](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080659/http:/www.dafont.com/uk-number-plate.font), [Licenz Plate](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080659/http:/www.dafont.com/licenz-plate.font), and [Charles Wright 2001](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080659/http:/www.charles-wright.com/more.html). [Mandatory](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080659/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/k-type/mandatory/) and [AF Carplates](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080659/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-acme/af-carplates/) are also close.

[edit]  
I added Charles Wright 2001 font to the list.
